name: Ahmed Ali
text: I CALL TO witness those who stand arrayed in rows,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And those who restrain by reprimanding,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And those who recite the Reminder,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily your God is One,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, and the Lord of the Easts.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He decked the nearest heavens with ornaments of stars,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Protecting them against every wayward devil,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So that they are not able to listen to the angels of higher (echelons), and are pelted from all sides

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And kept far away. There is perpetual punishment for them,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except those who eavesdrop and are pursued by a shooting flame.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So ask them if they are more difficult to create, or the rest We have created? Indeed (man) We created from fermented clay.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet while you are filled with wonder, they just scoff;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And when they are warned they pay no heed.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they see a sign, they laugh at it,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And say: "This is only magic.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When we are dead and turned to dust and bones, how can we be raised again,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And our fathers too?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You say: "Yes; and you will be lowly made."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There will only be a single jerk, and they will gape,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And say: "Ah woe! This is the Day of Reckoning."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "(Yes,) this is the Day of Judgement you had called a lie."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Gather all the wicked together and their comrades, and those they had worshipped

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than God," (the angels will be told), "then show them the way to Hell,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And detain them, for they will be questioned."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "What is the matter with you that you do not help each other?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will submit to questioning then,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And some of them will confront the others,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Saying: "It were you who imposed yourselves upon us."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will say: "No, you were the ones who would not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We had no power over you. In fact, you were a people rebellious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The sentence of our Lord has come true for us. We have certainly to taste (the punishment),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So, they will become partners in punishment.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is how We deal with sinners.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They were those who, when it was said to them, "There is no god but God," behaved with insolence,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "Should we abandon our gods for the sake of an insane poet?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Not in the least. He has brought the truth and confirmed the other messengers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You will indeed taste a painful punishment,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And be rewarded but only for what you had done,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except the chosen creatures of God,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whose provision is predetermined --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Fruits of every kind, and they will be honoured

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In gardens of delight,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Sitting) on couches, face to face,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: With cups from a flowing stream being passed around,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Clear, delicious to drink,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Neither dulling the senses nor intoxicating,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And with them maidens of modest look and large lustrous eyes,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Like sheltered eggs in a nest.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then one turned to the other in an enquiry.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Said one of the speakers: "I had a friend

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who used to say: 'Are you one of those who can testify to the truth?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Do you think) we would be paid back our due when we are dead and reduced to dust and bones?'

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: 'Will you look down?'

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He looked down and saw (his friend) in the midst of Hell.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: 'By God', he said, 'you had almost ruined me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord I too would have been there (in Hell).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Another will say:)"Is it true, we are not going to die

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than our first death, and we shall not be punished?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This will indeed be great happiness.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For this the toilers should strive."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Is this better or the tree of Zaqqum

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Which We have reserved as punishment for evil-doers?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is a tree that grows at the bottom of Hell.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will eat and fill their bellies with it,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Washing it down with boiling water.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then to Hell they will surely be returned.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They had found their fathers astray,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet they hasten to follow in their footsteps.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So had many an earlier people gone astray,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We had sent admonishers to them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Look, then how was the end of those who had been warned,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than the chosen creatures of God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We saved him and his family from the great affliction,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And made his progeny survive,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And left (his name) for posterity.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Peace on Noah among all men.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is how We reward those who do good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely he was among Our faithful creatures.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Afterwards We drowned the others.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And Abraham indeed was of his inducement,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he came to his Lord with a heart compliant,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he said to his father and his people: "What is this you worship?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Why do you solicit false gods instead of God?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: What do you imagine the Lord of the worlds to be?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then he looked up at the stars (they worshipped),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "I am sick (of what you worship)!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they turned their backs on him and went away.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then he turned towards their gods and said: "Why do you not eat (of these offerings)?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: What is wrong with you that you do not speak?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then he started striking them down with his right hand.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So the people descended upon him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Why do you worship these you carve yourselves," he asked,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "When God has created you and what you make?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Build a pyre for him and throw him into the raging fire."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So they contrived a plot against him, but We made them abject.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And he said: "I am going away to my Lord who will show me the way.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We gave him the good news of a clement son.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he was old enough to go about with him, he said: "O my son, I dreamt that I was sacrificing you. Consider, what you think?" He replied: "Father, do as you are commanded. If God pleases you will find me firm."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they submitted to the will of God, and (Abraham) laid (his son) down prostrate on his temple,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We called out: "O Abraham,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You have fulfilled your dream." Thus do We reward the good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That was indeed a trying test.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We ransomed him for a great sacrifice,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And left (his hallowed memory) for posterity.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Peace be on Abraham.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is how We reward those who do good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He is truly among Our faithful creatures.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We gave him the good news of Isaac, apostle, who is among the righteous.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We blessed him and Isaac. Among their descendants are some who do good, but some who wrong themselves.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We were indeed gracious to Moses and Aaron,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And saved them and their people from great distress,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And helped them, so they were victorious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We gave them the explicit Book,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And showed them the straight path,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And left (their remembrance) for posterity.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Peace be on Moses and Aaron.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is how We reward those who do good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They are among Our faithful devotees.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily Elias is one of the apostles.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he said to his people: "Will you not be mindful of God?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Would you call on Baal and leave the best of creators,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They denied him, and will surely be brought to punishment,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except the chosen creatures of God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We left his (memory) for posterity.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Peace be on Elias.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is how We reward those who do good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He is truly among Our faithful devotees.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily Lot was one of the apostles,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Wherefore We saved him and his entire family

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except an old woman who was one of those who stayed behind.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then We destroyed the others.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You pass by (their habitations) in the morning

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or at night. Then how is it you do not understand?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily Jonah is one of the apostles.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he fled on the laden ship,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And lots were cast (when a storm overtook them), he was rejected, (and thrown overboard).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then he was swallowed by a large fish as he was worthy of blame.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Had he not been one of those who struggled hard,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He would have stayed in its belly till the day the dead are raised.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We cast him, sick, on a barren shore,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We made a gourd tree grow over him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We sent him to a hundred thousand men or more,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they came to believe; so We allowed them to enjoy the good things of life for an age.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Now ask them if their Lord has daughters, and they sons?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or did We make the angels females, and they witnessed it?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Is it not a lie invented by them when they say:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "God has begotten (children)?" They are liars indeed!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Does He prefer sons to daughters?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: What ails you that you judge in such a wise?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Why do you not reflect?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or have you received some clear authority?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then bring your scripture, if what you say is true.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They link Him with jinns by lineage, yet the jinns know they will be brought before Him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: God is too glorious for what they ascribe to Him

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except His chosen creatures who do not.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So neither you nor those you worship

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Can mislead anyone away from Him,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except one who is (destined) to burn in Hell.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "There is not one of us who does not have his appointed place," (declare the angels.)

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "And we are truly those who stand in rows,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And we are those who sing hallelujas to Him."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They used to say:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If we had the account of earlier people with us,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We would have been the chosen creatures of God."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet now (that it has come) they refuse to believe in it; but they will come to know soon.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Our word had already been given before to Our votaries, the apostles, --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That they would be helped,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And that certainly Our armies will be victorious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So you ignore them for a time

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And wait; they will come to know soon.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do they want to hasten Our punishment?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When it comes down on their plains, it will be an evil dawn for those who had been warned.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So turn away from them for a time

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And watch; they will come to know soon.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Too glorious is your Lord, the Lord of power, for what they ascribe to Him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So peace be on the messengers,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And all praise to God, the Lord of all the worlds.
